channel.title: Folder protection
channel.description: How do I add a password onto a folder?

item.title: Folder protection
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:15, topic:397665”][quote author=Epic Steve link=topic=494803.msg3618371#msg3618371 date=1307182503]

I want to run my server, but protect my files so others cannot access them.

Archiving the folder is not an option

Wut? Your server files are on your computer? No one else can access them?

Who said they were?

Why wouldn’t they be?
[/quote]Hosting somewhere else?

If you was hosting on a friends computer - they shouldn’t try and edit it.
if you’re getting a hoster - just give them the class files every time the server updates.
if you’re hosting on a VPS then only he should have access.

What other possibilities are there?

It’s none of your business where Im hosting.

If you can’t answer the question, don’t post.

Stop being an ignorant cunt.

Do you even know what ignorant means?

Maybe you mean arrogant?[/quote]
Yes (:

Read full topic
